website_summaries.verdict: This full-featured option stands out for a lengthy cable and a large 5.3-gallon tank, but you will need to work to keep the filter clean.
pros: 15-foot cable and 5.3-gallon tank are larger than other options
Features overheating protection, and a filling level indicator
Ships with attachments for both carpeting and hard floors
cons: The filter tends to clog easily

customer_reviews.title: sucked up red coals with little
customer_reviews.text: This works well enough for us, it will loose some suction power when it's full but that's normal. The motor does get hot when running so not much heat mitigation or they are using an undersized motor for the job. it is fire resistant, sucked up red coals with little issue
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: The vacuum seems powerful enough but none of the attachments ...
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum seems powerful enough but none of the attachments fit correctly on the aluminum hose. One of the extension wands cracked, with barely any pressure trying to twist it on, and the crevice and brush attachments fall right off because you can't get them on tight enough to fit without breaking. Unfortunately, not being able to use the attachments restricts the purpose of this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Malone

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Have to admit, there was a broken part with my vac when I opened the box. HOWEVER, the company contacted me right away and offered me a couple of options for fixing the problem, which they took care of right away. Superb customer service. And the Vac works great!! Great suction and great size and design! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Snoderly

customer_reviews.title: Extension wands fit far too loosely in the base of vac and the wand tools fit too tightly...
customer_reviews.text: and while power cord wrap works, it leaves little room for wrapping the hose. It does clog and lose suction. Use the open and tap method to loosen the dust. Shouldn't need to be said but I'll say it anyway: don't do it inside, as just opening the motor alone kicks up plenty of fine dust. Long cord is nice. Overall unit size and weight are just right.
customer_reviews.author: Virtualmonk

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very nicely
customer_reviews.text: This is one clean little vacuum... Just moved into a house that a flu system that hadn’t been chean in many years and this thing took care of it. I was shocked how much power was generated by this little thing. Haven’t cleaned it yet, not really looking forward to that... but not to fault the vacuum. It was extremely easy to put together, just had to throw wheels in it and attach the hoses. Update: after talking to the stove installer he said try cleaning it.. well I did, they are definitely not the easiest to clean.. so be it.. still like it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Yolish

customer_reviews.title: A solid choice for a stove ash vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Assembly of base and handle required but everything goes together easily. Vacuum does a great job of sucking ashes when we clean our pellet stove. It isn't too noisy and comes with attachments for normal vacuuming but I wouldn't recommend using this vacuum for anything other than dealing with stove ashes. I purchased a stove ash vacuum from Home Depot and it cost $40 more, was very noisy and the motor burned out after one heating season. I can tell that the quality of this product is superior.
customer_reviews.author: Eins Vonuno

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I chose 4 stars is because the suction s not the best, but the filtration system is great. No soot escapes at all. Perfect for cleaning my pellet stove
customer_reviews.author: Claudia  Iannotti

customer_reviews.title: This vac works well
customer_reviews.text: vacuuming ash from fireplace...I mostly shovel it out into an ash bucket and use thius to clean crevices and my catalytic converter in Blaze King Insert. Also use it to clean dust and bugs etc out of gas fireplace....makes NO dust in the house that I can see and does a good job. Not too big or heavy but powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Roebear

customer_reviews.title: Been Using For Months
customer_reviews.text: We use for both a pellet grill cleaning and a Big Green Egg. We use this once a week. The suction is a little light as it will fill quickly and I need to occasionally clean out the filter and the hose, but it does work great. Months later, still running strong, no motor issues and I simply dump the ash in the garbage. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Martin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time yesterday, I very glad that I bought this product. It did everything that I wanted. If I could change one thing it would have 4 casters and not 3, but that has nothing to do with how the product performs.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Makes having a wood burning fireplace so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: I have two wood burning fireplaces and a big green egg. Having this for vacuuming ashes has been critical to my ability to really enjoy them! I had a “SnowJoe” brand and it was a lesson in frustration but this particular brand is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Mother Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until the filter killed the suction power.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box the unit seemed to be built well and I still think that. The suction power was excellent. A month later the unit almost picks up nothing. I suspect the filter is to blame and I have tried to clean it with no improvement in suction power. I don’t want to have to buy new filters every month. Not sure if this unit is worth the purchase. Update: After replacing all the filters and checking all connections, the suction has gone down to nearly nothing it is now just a worthless trashcan I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Gildosaurusrex

customer_reviews.title: Good ash vac
customer_reviews.text: This works great and has pretty great suction. I’ve used it multiple times and it does an awesome job, but if a certain peice of the hose touches the metal on the pellet stove it shocks the crap out of me ! It happens every time multiple times as I’m cleaning my pellet stove , not sure what causes it or why it’s doing it but this is why I rated 4 instead of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: katy

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for clean out pellet stove.
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it twice to clean out the pellet stove but it worked great. I haven't cleaned out the vacuum yet and haven't seen any decrease in suction. It's a little loud but not as bad as the old vacuum I was using. The first time I used it I did a deep clean on the stove. The vacuum head was warm to the touch when I was done but still functioning ok. It's not for commercial use but for what I got it for, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum has great suction and filters the dust very well. The only downside is the outer dacron filter clogs up pretty quickly. Plan on cleaning it often. This isn't a big issue as I know the ash is being caught by the filter instead of it getting blown into my house. The vacuum can be used as a shop vac as well. You wont be disappointed it does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my smoker
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what I needed it to do. I purchased for my smoker and has enough power to do what it was intended to do. Was a great buy for me
customer_reviews.author: T. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction
customer_reviews.text: This ash vacuum does have strong suction. It also seems to operate very cleanly, without discharge of dust or particulate matter into the air. I have only used it once so far, so I cannot comment on durability yet, but with the initial use, I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Magic

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job for cleaning my grill
customer_reviews.text: I use it to remove ashes from my kamado style grill have and have no complaints. I used it for a couple of minutes and the device got pretty hot. It was easy to put together and feels sturdy. I would prefer if there was different color options but that's not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Grahaminator

customer_reviews.title: Big time suction
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean my pellet stove with once in a while! Man this has some good power and suction. Clogs up fast but that doesnt bother me. I have another brand that I use for the initial sucking and this one for fine tuning before I close the door and relite. Awesome product! Great price! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great Suction
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum has been amazing. I have a pellet stove insert in my chimney and use this vacuum to get rid of all the ash. it has great suction. It's a bit loud but does the job. I would also like to note is that some of the attachments (brushes) have practically no suction what-so-ever.
customer_reviews.author: C.M. Liri

customer_reviews.title: Super strong
customer_reviews.text: Great vac for my pellet stoves. Nice and compact for easy storage
customer_reviews.author: Tony Rossetti

customer_reviews.title: Does the job as designed
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to meet the specifications as described by the seller. The unit cleans my pellet stove with no complaints. The extra attachments are nice although I do not plan on using them in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: James Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good so far.
customer_reviews.text: I have a wood burning fireplace and was wary of buying this after reading some of the reviews. So far I have used it to vacuum out the fireplace four times. It has given me no issues. The only drawback I am not loving is getting the attachments to stay on their holders. The hose has clogged a couple of times but that is me trying to suck up pieces that are far to large anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The attachments for this vacuum and not easily stored with the vac. There are not enough spaces on the machine to put the provided attachments Plus the flex hose could be a bit longer everything else is great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Ashes gone
customer_reviews.text: Great ash vacuum, filter keeps dust free. Works great on pellet stove ash.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Ragione

customer_reviews.title: Great suction no dust in the house
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum is just what I needed for my Wood pellet stove. I also used it on my hobbit wood burner and my fireplace without any dust entering the room. Easy to clean and greet suction.
customer_reviews.author: jondog

customer_reviews.title: Great suction power.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this on my Kamado Joe a couple of times and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great suction and power.
customer_reviews.text: Great power, clean it regularly and it won't let you down.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Forget the hassle of a brush and dustpan! This product is perfect and works exactly as described. We are so happy with it because of its ease of use while keeping us less sooty in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Good quality. Use it every week to clean my pellet stove. No issues as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: EColón

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Used the vacuum weekly now for approximately a month to clean out my two pellet stoves. It has plenty of suction and does exactly what it should. No dust is thrown from the unit that I can see! Overall a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have a small fireplace, and this vacuum does an excellent job of sucking up all of the ash. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Tips over to easy
customer_reviews.text: I like everything except the center of gravity. The wheels are to close together. It keeps tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great ashvac!
customer_reviews.text: We use it for out wood burning pellet stove and it works amazing! The suction on it is great and the hose is long enough that you have room to work.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Much better than a shop vac
customer_reviews.text: The ash vacuum makes cleaning the pellet stove a breeze. I have use a shop vac in the past. This unit reduces the dust and handles the occasional hot amber very well.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Plimpton

customer_reviews.title: It works for my Pellet Stove
customer_reviews.text: Never having a pellet stove before, nor knowing how to clean it. This makes it a cinch. Make sure the ashes are cold before using.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Starkey

customer_reviews.title: Broke After 2 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: Had to return totally died after 2 weeks of light use. Suction not so good.
customer_reviews.author: JohnWells

customer_reviews.title: Great ash vac
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vacuum for our pellet stove. Made the whole stove burn so much cleaner (less black on the glass) right after we used it. Good suction and does the job real quick! Worth it if you want to keep ash out of your normal vacuum. Wish I got an ash vacuum earlier!
customer_reviews.author: Rosey

customer_reviews.title: Great suction.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to clean my pellet stove. Though it doesn't come with specific pellet stove cleaning supplies, it worked fine when I cleaned my stove. It's quieter than another ash vacuum I bought (that failed quickly).
customer_reviews.author: Scott T

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised for me
customer_reviews.text: Has worked well all winter for me. Used daily to sweep out the ash from my pellet stove. I cleaned it out often and never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Can’t clean my pellet stove out from 2 days use without having to clean the filter twice. 🤬
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beat vac for fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I returned another brand & bought this one. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy vacuum for cleaning my pellet stove. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie mae

customer_reviews.title: Ash control in the house
customer_reviews.text: Have used it on my pellet stove for about 3 weeks, so far so good. I really like that its filtered really well and not blowing ash back into my house.
customer_reviews.author: Julie reid

customer_reviews.title: Clogs easily
customer_reviews.text: Filter clogs easily. Had to empty within 1 minute of use and tank was less than 1/8 full. Hose is very narrow so small pieces of wood causes clogging. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great power and suction for pellet stove ash.
customer_reviews.text: The suction on this vac is very powerful & would highly recommend it. I was able to clean my pellet stove ash quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ash Vac
customer_reviews.text: We've had a different one, that died! This ash vac far surpasses our ole one when it was new! Great suction! Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at the suction power. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yes you will need to clean micron filter often but no dust or ash will be in your house
customer_reviews.text: We love it. great suction we will clean it out after every use. worth it . great vacuum
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works good but filter bag needs to be cleaned frequently
customer_reviews.author: Shelly N.

customer_reviews.title: it's a great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I like it except for when you run it ,if your to close you get a static shocks,at least I think is where the shocks come from,other than that issue I love it
customer_reviews.author: danielivan steadman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is great I use it for my car and my coal stove suction is great could use a fourth wheel tips over once and a while
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Service top notch
customer_reviews.text: When the vac came it was missing the handle I contacted the company and they sent me one rite away no problem. I use it daily to clean my pellet stove works great would recommend it to any one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to clean out a Harman pellet stove. With the exception of one attachment I wish it had, I couldn’t be happier with the vacuum. Good suction power.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use as a shop vac and for my pellet grill. It was a little smaller than I expected it to be but it works like a dream.. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Otree Doubie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Been working great for us! Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The quality, suction power, and overall performance has exceeded our expectations. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nice

customer_reviews.title: Works, but missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I only received 2 of the 3 wheels. Other than that, works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Whyte

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long...
customer_reviews.text: Whole unit is lightweight, which allows it to tip easily. Otherwise, it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Teri D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product but the brush bristles should be made out of metal
customer_reviews.author: Nilver Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Good suction until filter gets plugged.
customer_reviews.text: The suction is good until the filter plugs up. Is hard to get the filter clean.
customer_reviews.author: B.J. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well, will not hold a tremendous amount of ash but overall adaquate.
customer_reviews.author: James S Nicholson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any suction
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why all the positive reviews unless I got a defective unit, but the thing worked for maybe 10 minutes until it's usefulness went to 0. The suction power on this thing is abysmal, I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Performs well.
customer_reviews.text: The vacume has super suction power! The unit is pretty light, which I like . The area I believe it falls short in is the base with wheels. I believe it should be wider. A few times the vacume tipped over when rolling it across my floor( no damage done). The base is also where some of the attachments are stored making them feel crowded when stored. That aside the performance is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Francis  B. White

product_meta.title: BACOENG 5.3-Gallon Ash Vacuum Cleaner with Double Stage Filtration System, Advanced Ash Vac
feature_bullets: Super Ash Vacuum is a multi-use vauccum – including regular dry-shop vacuum uses – that is ideal for almost any indoor job.
Double-stage filtration system prevents fine dust particles from escaping into your breathing space and protects the motor from being damaged.
Filling level indicator informs you when it is time to empty the canister. 10-Amp motor with heating protection provides substantial suction power and ensures your safety.
5-foot(1.5-meter) extended lined-metal hose and a 15-foot (4.5-meter) cable allows for flexible cleaning around corners and in tight spaces.

Includes: Container lid, Metal container, Flexible metal suction hose, Aluminum suction tube, HEPA filter, Filter bag, Wheel holder with wheel, Extension wands, Crevice nozzle, Upholstery nozzle, and Combi-attachment for carpets and smooth floors.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars196 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
